description: Ailurophile stealer is PHP based information stealer. The malware is advertised online and sold via a subscription model. It has capabilities to steal data stored in browsers including auto-fill information, cookies, credentials, banking details, browsing history and cryptocurrency wallets. This rule detects a artefacts associated with the malware.
search: ((metaclass:windows ((class=ms_defender category:`advancedhunting-deviceprocessevents`) OR (source:`microsoft-windows-sysmon` eventid=1) OR (source:`microsoft-windows-security-auditing` eventid=4688))) OR (class:fireeye_hx_ioc assets.properties.os:`windows` eventtype:processevent)) process:php.exe args:&[`-c`,`php-cli.ini`,`index.php`] NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4
